==Preventing malfunctions in the medication circuit===
The 5-B rule is an educational tool designed to prevent errors.

The 5 Bs:

*Good Patient
*Right Drug
*Right Dose
*Right Route
*Right Time

question.title: What is the purpose of the 5-B rule in preventing medication circuit malfunctions?
question.description: The 5-B rule is an educational tool designed to prevent errors.

option_a.title: To ensure that the patient receives the correct medication at the right time
option_a.description: The 5-B rule is primarily focused on the timing of medication administration.

option_b.title: To prevent medication errors by ensuring the right drug is used
option_b.description: The 5-B rule is primarily focused on the type of medication administered.

option_c.title: To ensure that the patient receives the correct medication at the right dose
option_c.description: The 5-B rule is primarily focused on the dosage of medication administered.

option_d.title: To ensure that the patient receives the correct medication at the right time, dose, and route
option_d.description: The 5-B rule is a comprehensive approach to preventing medication errors.

correct_option.title: D
correct_option.description: The correct answer is the option that accurately reflects the purpose of the 5-B rule.
